categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A battle at the planet Druckenwell was one of the first engagements between the New Republic and the Galactic Empire after the Battle of Endor.

After the end of the Nagai–Tof War, the New Republic launched its main liberation campaign against the Empire. After the Battle of Glom Tho, the Imperial forces abandoned Kalarba and the New Republic settled on this planet. That New Republic forces later linked up there with a task force coming from Bothawui in order to attack Druckenwell. After the battle, the New Republic went to Kashyyyk.
